1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Calculation on time.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Data.Type.Time.TimeCalc
6  ( -- * Arithmetic
7    timeAddDay, timeAddWeek, timeAddMonth, timeAddYear,
8    timeAddClock, timeDiff,
9
10    -- * First day
11    timeFloorMonth, timeFloorYear,
12    timeCeilMonth, timeCeilYaer,
13
14    -- * Range
15    timeRangeDay, timeRangeMonth, timeRangeYear,
16  ) where
17
18import qualified Data.Time.Calendar                         as Tim
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture                   as O
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                       as B
21import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Type.Time.Clock       as D
22import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Type.Time.ClockCalc   as D
23import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Type.Time.Date        as D
24import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Type.Time.Time        as D
25import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.Message               as Msg
26
27
28-- ----------------------  Add
29
30-- | Add days to time.
31timeAddDay :: D.Days -> O.Map D.Time
32timeAddDay n = D.timeAltDays (+ n)
33
34-- | Add weeks to time.
35timeAddWeek :: Integer -> O.Map D.Time
36timeAddWeek n = timeAddDay (7 * n)
37
38-- | Add months to time.
39timeAddMonth :: Integer -> O.Map D.Time
40timeAddMonth n time = D.timeFromYmd y' (fromInteger m') d where
41    (y, m, d)  = D.timeYmdTuple time
42    (yd, m')   = (toInteger m + n) `divMod` 12
43    y'         = y + yd
44
45-- | Add years to time.
46timeAddYear :: D.Year -> O.Map D.Time
47timeAddYear n time = D.timeFromYmd (y + n) m d where
48    (y, m, d) = D.timeYmdTuple time
49
50-- | Add clock to time.
51timeAddClock :: D.Clock -> B.AbMap D.Time
52timeAddClock c1 (D.TimeYmdcz d2 c2 z2) = timeAddClockWith time c1 d2 c2 where
53    time d c = D.TimeYmdcz d c z2
54timeAddClock c1 (D.TimeYmdc d2 c2) = timeAddClockWith D.TimeYmdc c1 d2 c2
55timeAddClock (D.ClockD d) t@(D.TimeYmd _) = Right $ timeAddDay d t
56timeAddClock _ _ = Msg.adlib "add-clock"
57
58timeAddClockWith :: (D.Date -> D.Clock -> D.Time) -> D.Clock -> D.Date -> D.Clock -> B.Ab D.Time
59timeAddClockWith time c1 d2 c2 =
60    do c3 <- D.clockAdd c1 c2
61       let (d3, _) = D.clockDaysSec c3
62           c4      = D.clockCutDay  c3
63       Right $ timeAddDay d3 $ time d2 c4
64
65
66-- ----------------------  Sub
67
68-- | Calculate clock from time to time.
69timeDiff :: D.Time -> D.Time -> B.Ab D.Clock
70timeDiff (D.TimeYmdcz d2 c2 _) (D.TimeYmdcz d1 c1 _)  = timeDiffDc d2 c2 d1 c1
71timeDiff (D.TimeYmdc d2 c2)    (D.TimeYmdc d1 c1)     = timeDiffDc d2 c2 d1 c1
72timeDiff (D.TimeYmd d2) (D.TimeYmd d1)  = Right $ D.ClockD $ timeDiffDate d2 d1
73timeDiff (D.TimeYm  d2) (D.TimeYm  d1)  = Right $ D.ClockD $ timeDiffDay  d2 d1
74timeDiff _ _ = Msg.adlib "time-diff"
75
76timeDiffDc :: D.Date -> D.Clock -> D.Date -> D.Clock -> B.Ab D.Clock
77timeDiffDc d2 c2 d1 c1 =
78    do let d3 = timeDiffDate d2 d1
79       c3 <- D.clockSub c2 c1
80       Right $ D.clockAddDay d3 c3
81
82timeDiffDate :: D.Date -> D.Date -> Integer
83timeDiffDate d2 d1 = D.dateMjd d2 `timeDiffDay` D.dateMjd d1
84
85timeDiffDay :: D.Mjd -> D.Mjd -> Integer
86timeDiffDay d2 d1 = Tim.toModifiedJulianDay d2 - Tim.toModifiedJulianDay d1
87
88
89-- ----------------------  First day
90
91-- | Convert to the first day of month.
92--
93--   >>> timeFloorMonth $ timeFromYmd 2014 11 3
94--   2014-11-01
95--
96timeFloorMonth :: O.Map D.Time
97timeFloorMonth time =
98    case D.timeYmdTuple time of
99      (y, m, _) -> D.timeFromYmd y m 1
100
101-- | Convert to the first day of year.
102--
103--   >>> timeFloorYear $ timeFromYmd 2014 11 3
104--   2014-01-01
105--
106timeFloorYear :: O.Map D.Time
107timeFloorYear time =
108    case D.timeYmdTuple time of
109      (y, _, _) -> D.timeFromYmd y 1 1
110
111-- | Convert to the first day of next month.
112--
113--   >>> timeCeilMonth $ timeFromYmd 2014 11 3
114--   2014-12-01
115--
116--   >>> timeCeilMonth $ timeFromYmd 2014 12 25
117--   2015-01-01
118--
119timeCeilMonth :: O.Map D.Time
120timeCeilMonth time =
121    case D.timeYmdTuple time of
122      (y, m, _) -> D.timeFromYmdTuple $ monthUp (y, m, 1)
123
124-- | Convert to the first day of next year.
125--
126--    >>> timeCeilYaer $ timeFromYmd 2014 11 3
127--    2015-01-01
128--
129timeCeilYaer :: O.Map D.Time
130timeCeilYaer time =
131    case D.timeYmdTuple time of
132      (y, _, _) -> D.timeFromYmdTuple $ yearUp (y, 1, 1)
133
134
135-- ----------------------  Range
136
137-- | Create range of time.
138--
139--   >>> timeRangeDay (timeFromYmd 2014 11 3) (timeFromYmd 2014 11 5)
140--   [2014-11-03, 2014-11-04, 2014-11-05]
141--
142timeRangeDay :: B.RangeBy D.Time
143timeRangeDay from to = map D.timeFromMjd [D.timeMjd from .. D.timeMjd to]
144
145-- | Create range of time.
146--
147--   >>> timeRangeMonth (timeFromYmd 2014 12 31) (timeFromYmd 2015 03 5)
148--   [2014-12-31, 2015-01-31, 2015-02-28]
149--
150timeRangeMonth :: B.RangeBy D.Time
151timeRangeMonth = timeRangeBy monthUp
152
153-- | Create range of time.
154timeRangeYear :: B.RangeBy D.Time
155timeRangeYear = timeRangeBy yearUp
156
157timeRangeBy :: O.Map D.Ymd -> B.RangeBy D.Time
158timeRangeBy step from to = times where
159    dayFrom =  D.timeYmdTuple from
160    dayTo   =  D.timeYmdTuple to
161    times   =  map D.timeFromYmdTuple $ B.rangeBy step dayFrom dayTo
162
163-- | Increment month.
164monthUp :: O.Map D.Ymd
165monthUp (y, m, d) | m < 12    = (y, m + 1, d)
166                  | otherwise = (y + 1, 1, d)
167
168-- | Increment year.
169yearUp :: O.Map D.Ymd
170yearUp (y, m, d)  | y == (-1) = (1, m, d)
171                  | otherwise = (y + 1, m, d)
